name: Mustard Sauce For Stone Crabs
recipeYield: About 1 cup sauce, enough for 4 servings

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the mustard and mayonnaise and beat for 1 minute. Add the remaining ingredients and beat until the mixture reaches a creamy consistency. Chill for at least 1/2 hour. Serve with stone crabsfor dipping.
